item.title: Respect is Owed, But It Can Be Lost
item.description: A fundamental truth about respect is often forgotten. Respect is not a reward to be earned.

item.title: Two-Way Street of Misunderstanding: The Double Empathy Problem
item.description: We meet someone new, and our minds instantly begin sorting them into a box. “The funny one.

item.title: Tribal Tests: How Harsh Environments Expose a Lack of Wisdom
item.description: When we romanticize tribal life, we imagine close-knit communities guided by the serene wisdom of elders.
